purpose: The email announces two full-time, permanent academic positions available at the School of Mathematical & Computational Sciences at Massey University, specifically within the Computer Science and Information Technology group. The university is looking for candidates with expertise in AI, cybersecurity, software engineering, or human-computer interaction. The roles involve teaching and supervising students at both undergraduate and postgraduate levels, as well as leading research programs and seeking external funding. Interested candidates can find more details and application instructions through the provided link.
